sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词均有"保持，保存"之意。
sameAnalysis.word_list: keep, retain, reserve, preserve, conserve, withhold
means: keep ： 最常用词，指长时间牢固地保持或保存。
reserve ： 正式用词，指为了将来的用途或其他用途而保存、保留。
preserve ： 主要指为防止损害、变质等而保存。
conserve ： 一般指保存自然资源，保全人的精力、力量等。
withhold ： 指扣住不放，暗示有阻碍。

word_mean: 储备：扣留某物以供将来使用
储备〔力〕，储量：超出正常使用的供应量，可供紧急情况时利用

jx.jx_en_mean: Kept back, set aside, or saved.

means.word_mean: 保留;保存
其他释义

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: from Old French reserver, from Latin reservare 'keep back', from re- 'back' + servare 'to keep'

entry.def: If something is reserved for a particular person or purpose, it is kept specially for that person or purpose.

example.ex: A double room with a balcony overlooking the sea had been reserved for him...
example.tran: 特地为他预留了一间带阳台的海景双人房。

example.ex: In the United States lanes are reserved for cars with more than one occupant.
example.tran: 在美国，多人乘坐的汽车有专行道。

entry.def: If you reserve something such as a table, ticket, or magazine, you arrange for it to be kept specially for you, rather than sold or given to someone else.

example.ex: I'll reserve a table for five...
example.tran: 我要预订一张5人的桌子。

example.ex: Demand will be huge, so ask your newsagent to reserve your copy today.
example.tran: 需求量会很大，所以今天得请卖报摊主为你预留出你那份。

entry.def: A reserve is a supply of something that is available for use when it is needed.

example.ex: The Gulf has 65 per cent of the world's oil reserves...
example.tran: 海湾地区拥有全世界65％的石油储藏。

example.ex: A friend can be a reserve of help in times of trouble.
example.tran: 朋友可以在困难的时候提供帮助。

entry.def: In sports, a reserve is someone who is available to play as part of a team if one of the members is ill or cannot play.

example.ex: He ended up as a reserve, but still qualified for a team gold medal.
example.tran: 他最后成了替补队员，但仍有资格获得团体金牌。

entry.def: A nature reserve is an area of land where the animals, birds, and plants are officially protected.

example.ex: Marine biologists are calling for Cardigan Bay to be created a marine nature reserve to protect the dolphins.
example.tran: 海洋生物学家号召将卡迪根湾建成一个海洋自然保护区，以保护那里的海豚。

entry.def: If someone shows reserve, they keep their feelings hidden.

example.ex: The subject is one which must be discussed with reserve...
example.tran: 对这个话题必须进行慎重的讨论。

example.ex: His natural reserve made him appear self-conscious.
example.tran: 他天生的内敛性格让他显得有些拘谨。

entry.def: If you have something in reserve, you have it available for use when it is needed.

example.ex: ...the bottle of whisky that he kept in reserve...
example.tran: 他特地留的那瓶威士忌

example.ex: There were patrol cars on the streets and riot police standing by in reserve.
example.tran: 巡逻车在街上守候，防暴警察也在一旁待命。

entry.def: A military reserve is a group of soldiers who are ready to join a military operation if they are needed.

means.word_mean: 1. formality and propriety of manner
2. something kept back or saved for future use or a special purpose
3. an athlete who plays only when another member of the team drops out
4. (medicine) potential capacity to respond in order to maintain vital functions
5. a district that is reserved for particular purpose
6. armed forces that are not on active duty but can be called in an emergency
7. the trait of being uncommunicative; not volunteering anything more than necessary
1. hold back or set aside, especially for future use or contingency;

sentences.sentence: "they held back their applause in anticipation"

means.word_mean: 2. give or assign a share of money or time to a particular person or cause;

sentences.sentence: "I will earmark this money for your research"

means.word_mean: 3. obtain or arrange (for oneself) in advance;

sentences.sentence: "We managed to reserve a table at Maxim's"

means.word_mean: 4. arrange for and reserve (something for someone else) in advance;

sentences.sentence: "reserve me a seat on a flight"
"The agent booked tickets to the show for the whole family"

means.word_mean: 1. not engaged in military action
2. kept in reserve especially for emergency use;

stems_affixes.word_buile: reserve[n.储备[物],储备金;缄默 v.保留,储备;预定]+ed……的→保留的,不多说的
service[n.服务;公共设施;维修保养;行政部门 v.维修]+able能……的→可服务的→有用的
serv服务+ile……的→为[主人]服务的
deserve[v.应受,值得]+dly→adv.应得报酬地,当然地
con全部+serv保持+e→全部保持下来→保存

stems_affixes.value_cn: 保存,保护,保守;守恒,不灭
stems_affixes.word_buile: conserve保存,保藏+ation表名词→n.保存,保护,保守;守恒,不灭
conserve保存,保藏+ative物→n.保守主义者
servile[adj.奴性的,百依百顺的]+ity表名词→n.奴态,卑屈
de去掉+sert=serv服务,上菜→把正餐撤走,上餐后甜点
ob加强+serve=serv保持+ance表名词→一直在保持→遵守,奉行
observe观察,观测,注意到+ation表名词→n.观察,观测,监视;[n.]观察资料;观察力
observe观察+atory场所→用来观察的场所
re再+serv保留+e→再保留
reserve保留,储备+oir→保留水的地方
serv服务+ant人→服务[主人]的人→仆人

stems_affixes.value_cn: 服务;公共设施;维修保养;行政部门
stems_affixes.word_buile: serv服务+ice→n.服务;公共设施;维修保养;行政部门 v.维修

stems_affixes.value_cn: 奴隶状态,惩役,地役权,使用权
stems_affixes.word_buile: serv服务+itude状态→服务的状态→奴隶状态,惩役
con全部+serv保持+e→全部保持下来→保存
de加强+serv服务+e→加强服务→值得[重视]
dis不,坏+serv服务+e→坏的服务→危害

stems_affixes.value_cn: 观察,观测,注意到,监视,遵守,评述,说
stems_affixes.word_buile: ob加强动作+serv保持+e→一直保持→遵守,引申为观察
pre预先+serv保留+e→预先保留→保存
re再+serv保留+e→再保留
serv服务+ice→n.服务;公共设施;维修保养;行政部门 v.维修

means.word_mean: 保留[储备]某物

sentences.en: We'll reserve the ticket for you till tomorrow noon.
sentences.cn: 票为您保留到明天中午。

means.word_mean: 具有或保持(某种权利)

sentences.en: The management reserves the right to refuse admission.

means.word_mean: 预订或保留(座位、住处等); 订购

sentences.en: These seats are reserved for teachers.
sentences.cn: 这些座位是留给老师的。

means.word_mean: 推迟；留到以后

sentences.en: This problem should be reserved for further consideration.
sentences.cn: 这个问题应留到以后进一步考虑。

means.word_mean: 贮藏; 储备

sentences.en: We must keep back a reserve of food.
sentences.cn: 我们必须贮存一些食品。

means.word_mean: 保护区

sentences.en: This area was once a wildlife reserve.
sentences.cn: 该地区曾是一个野生动物保护区。

sentences.en: Scientists believe there are about 1,600 giant pandas living in reserves in the mountains of China..
sentences.cn: 科学家认为有1600只大熊猫生活在中国山区的保护区。

means.word_mean: 矜持, 拘谨; 寡言

jushi.english: We must reserve some of corn to use as seed.
jushi.chinese: 我们必须贮存一些玉米粒作种子用。

jushi.english: Seek common ground on major questions while reserving differences on minor ones.
I reserve the right to make my own decision.
jushi.chinese: 我保留自己作决定的权利。
